price: Neki su ljudi prije vas pitali za to, pa su poslije zbog toga postali nevjernici.
arabic: قَدۡ سَأَلَهَا قَوۡمٞ مِّن قَبۡلِكُمۡ ثُمَّ أَصۡبَحُواْ بِهَا كَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qad sa-alahā qawmun min qablikum thumma aṣbaḥū bihā kāfirīna
